name: Hero Maestro Edge
description: Hero Maestro Edge 125 Series has been such a successful fleet over the last few years in the Bangladesh and Indian market. As a continuation Bajaj launched Pulsar NS160 in the Bangladesh market. The Mestro Edge NS 60 is a full naked sports bike. In this category bikes demand is very limited here in the local market.

name: Bajaj Pulsar
description: Bajaj Pulsar Series has been such a successful fleet over the last few years in the Bangladesh and Indian market. As a continuation Bajaj launched Pulsar NS160 in the Bangladesh market. The pulsar NS 60 is a full naked sports bike. In this category bikes demand is very limited here in the local market.

name: mahindra-centuro
description: Mahindra Centuro N1 is the latest addition to the Centuro version. Its journey started simultaneously in the market of India and Bangladesh. Mahindra's bikes also have some unique features, such as the Remote Flip key with key light and bike to prevent theft
